pageContext.claim: “Don't worry about it, by November 4th they'll announce your state is opening. On November 4th, uh, North Carolina will be opened on November 4th. Right after the election, 'cause they want us to look bad, they don't care about people, they want us to look bad, they want to to try and steal an election.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump falsely claims Democrats in Congress and Democratic governors are using the pandemic to harm the economy before the election and are planning to reverse course on November 4. Democrats in the House have actually passed a substantial economic-relief bill that the GOP majority in the Senate has refused to consider. If Democrats truly wanted to hurt the economy to enhance their chances of victory in the November election, they would not be pressing for more action. Similarly, Trump falsely says Democratic governors will lift an coronavirus restrictions the day after Election Day because they are only trying to thwart his re-election. That did not happen, as covid-19 cases kept soaring.
